search_easter_2021/4001_1201_0300_10: Where in the world did he go?!
search_easter_2021/4001_1201_0400_10: Looks like we’ll just have to search for him, too!
search_easter_2021/4002_1201_0100_10:
All that searching, and we never did find that
Pokémon Egg, huh?
search_easter_2021/4002_1201_0200_10:
*sigh* Well, the only thing we can do is hope that
someone else found it. Let’s head back to
the arena.
search_easter_2021/4002_1201_0300_10: Yeah. I just really hope someone found it...
search_easter_2021/4002_1201_0600_10:
If you’re that worried about it, just work up the
courage and ask her!
search_easter_2021/4002_1201_0700_10: I just can’t seem to get the right opportunity...
search_easter_2021/4002_1201_0900_10: Hey, Wally! Did you find a lot of eggs?
search_easter_2021/4002_1201_1000_10: Yes, I did! Oh, and take a look at this!
search_easter_2021/4002_1101_1600_20: Wally showed them the Egg he found.
search_easter_2021/4002_1201_1100_10:
Wait! Could this be that Egg we’ve been
looking for?!
search_easter_2021/4002_1201_1400_10: Could I ask you a favor?
